item.description: goåç¨‹å¹¶å‘æ§åˆ¶ learn go åˆ©ç”¨WaitGroupå’Œé˜»å¡channelå®ç°åç¨‹å¹¶å‘æ§åˆ¶,å§‹ç»ˆä¿æŒåç¨‹ä¸æ ¸å¿ƒæ•°é‡ç›¸ç­‰ const ( conNum = 4 //cpu cores ) func main() { wg := &sync.WaitGroup{} ch := make(chan bool, conNum) var list map[string]string err := someApi(api_url, &list) if err != nil { log.Fatalln(err) } for k, v := range list { wg.Add(1) ch <- true go func(wg *sync.WaitGroup, id string, url string) { err := doSomeThing(id, url) if err != nil { log.Println(err) } <-ch defer wg.Done() }(wg, k, v) } wg.
